articles.title: Do the Bruins have a potential breakout prospect in camp in Dans Locmelis?
articles.description:
“I think he's a little bit of a coach's binky in the fact that he does a lot of a lot of things well and he's got a real good future.”

The post Do the Bruins have a potential breakout prospect in camp in Dans Locmelis? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins prospect Dans Locmelis impresses coaches with versatile skills during training camp.
Locmelis is seen as a potential breakout player for the 2025 season.
His performance could influence the Bruins' roster decisions and fan expectations.
